amendment.description: An amendment numbered 88 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds in division A of H.R. 1 to be used to research, develop, or test the Expeditionary Fighting Vehicle and the Surface-Launched Advanced Medium-Range Air-to-Air Missile program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kind amendment (A099) Failed by recorded vote: 123 - 306 (Roll no. 102).
